text: Les Grands Chemins ("The Great Roads") is a 1951 novel by the French writer Jean Giono. It was the basis for the 1963 film Of Flesh and Blood, directed by Christian Marquand. ==References== Category:1951 French novels Category:French novels adapted into films Category:French-language novels Category:Novels by Jean Giono Category:Éditions Gallimard books
title: Les Grands Chemins
